    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    App
    Starts the JavaFX application by setting up and displaying the primary stage.
    AuthenticationController
    Authentication Controller - Login Page to get into Manager View
    CashierDrink
    Class representing a drink item in the cashier system.
    Controller
    Main controller for navigating between different drink category views and handling customization pop-ups in the Boba Shop JavaFX application.
    CustomizeController
    Controller class for handling drink customization in the application.
    DatabaseConnection
    Helps connect to the database.
    DrinkController
    Drink Controller - Allows managers to do CRUD operations on ingredients in drinks
    Employee
    A public class that contains all information about an employee.
    EmployeeController
    Employee Controller - Allows the manager to update, add, or delete employee information
    FullOrder
    FullOrder contains all of the drinks for one order and gets the total price for it.
    Ingredient
    A public class that contains all information about an ingredient.
    ManagerController
    Manager Controller - Only avaiable to the managers and has product usage report, x report, and z report.
    ManagerInventoryController
    Manager Inventory Controller - Allows the manager to update, add, or delete inventory items
    MenuItem
    A public class for a drink with getters and setters to make updating properties of the drinks accross controllers easier.
    NewDrinkController
    Handles the new drinks being added by the manager
    OrderController
    Controller class for handling orders in the application.
    SeasonalDrinksController
    Seasonal Drinks Controller - Handles the seasonal drinks
    SettingsController
    Settings Controller - Only avaiable to the managers and has all the options available for managers.
    UpdateMenuController
    UpdateMenu Controller - Allows the manager to update, add, or delete menu items
